Claws Of Saurtopia, Income Tax Refund & SPXLXNKX go GieszerFest


There’s no poster for this particular event tomorrow, because they’re all over town anyway, but here’s some basic information:

Saturday, 28th April 2018

Barłóg [Poland] CRK Salka — rhythmic noise

»Barłóg is another offshoot of the Wrocław-based CRK rehearsal room. It’s comprised of ex-members of bands such as Norymberga, Jan Chrzciciel John the Baptist and Róża Lux - with Barłóg being stylistically distant towards all of the above mentioned. Currently the band has been working on their debut release produced by legendary Geza X Gedeon.«

https://barlog.bandcamp.com
https://vimeo.com/133329014
www.youtube.com/watch?v=HjqGvIgg-5M
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uhT6Eb9Puyw
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B1Ag4HFVqI


Biggest Rat [Berlin] CRK Salka — sophisti-noise

»Biggest Rat is Joe Biggerstaff, a multi-instrumentalist who has been making bedroom recordings since age 15. In Biggest Rat he tries his hand at pop music, drawing on a range of influences including Lee Hazlewood, Scott Walker, and R. Stevie Moore, refracted through a lo-fi 90s slacker lens.«

https://biggestrat.bandcamp.com

2035 [Paris] — free improv in rock and jazz

Guitar, saxophone, drums—improvise!

https://soundcloud.com/user-744463536

LOCATION SPXLXNKX
DOORS/TÜR/PORTES 8pm

April 27th, 2018 10:03pm Claws Of Saurtopia free improv noise
